def find_all(array, n):
    return [index for index, item in enumerate(array) if item == n]

def find_all(array, n):
    return [ i for i,v in enumerate(array) if v==n ]

def find_all(array, n):
    return [i for i,x in enumerate(array) if x == n]

def find_all(array, n):
  return [i for i in range(len(array)) if array[i] == n]

def find_all(array, n):
    return [i[0] for i in enumerate(array) if i[1]==n]

def find_all(array, n):
    return [pos for pos, number in enumerate(array) if number == n]

def find_all(array, n):
    return [i for i, number in enumerate(array) if number == n]
